title: Gauge invariant formulation of $N=2$ Toda and KdV systems in extended superspace
abstract:
We give a gauge invariant formulation of $N=2$ supersymmetric abelian Toda field equations in 
2 superspace. Superconformal invariance is studied. The conserved currents are shown to be associated with Drinfeld-Sokolov type gauges. The extension to non-abelian 
2 Toda equations is discussed. Very similar methods are then applied to a matrix formulation in 
2 superspace of one of the 
2 KdV hierarchies.
